definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to pay a sum of money/payment
to withdraw money from a bank

sentences.english: I showed him a wide selection, and quickly he picked out a pair.
sentences.chinese: 我给他展示了许多款选择，很快他选种了一对。

sentences.english: This means that there are two big unknowns about the robot.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着这款机器人存在着两大疑点。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金额个人货物款的一个好处是它不需要确认信用度。

sentences.english: But Samsung also offers it in some wealthy European countries like France.
sentences.chinese: 但三星也在法国等一些富裕欧洲国家发售这款手机。

sentences.english: Already be the luxurious go-anywhere vehicle that money buys with helping Tibet all on the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路上已经满是用援藏款买的豪华越野车。

sentences.english: Since earlier this year, the game has been discussed by overseas-based human rights organizations.
sentences.chinese: 从今年年初开始，海外人权组织开始讨论这款游戏。

sentences.english: One of the game's big selling points is its action-oriented movement.
sentences.chinese: 这款游戏的最大的卖点在于动感十足。

sentences.english: Some homeowners are delinquent, or unable to make the payments on costly, exotic mortgages they took out during the boom.
sentences.chinese: 一些屋主拖欠债务，或者无力支付高额的按揭款。

sentences.english: If you love Labyrinth games, then Kingdom Skulls is for you.
sentences.chinese: 如果您喜欢迷宫游戏，这款骷髅王国是为你准备的。

sentences.english: I just love this lotion and the whole line of products.
sentences.chinese: 我只喜欢这款乳液以及这个品牌的全线产品。

sentences.english: Wide ovals and sleek cat-eye styles work to diminish fullness.
sentences.chinese: 宽椭圆形和圆滑的猫眼款可以起到收敛圆脸的效果。

sentences.english: Dazzle her with these one of a kind sapphire and diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: 这款精致炫目的蓝宝石钻石耳环一定令她惊喜不已。

sentences.english: Star Wars themed alarm clock will project the time on your wall.
sentences.chinese: 这款星球大战主题闹钟会把时间投影到你的墙上。

sentences.english: The donations, however, represented about 60% of all his campaign money.
sentences.chinese: 可是，捐赠款占他竞选资金的60%。

sentences.english: Some blame the design of the phone's radios and antennas.
sentences.chinese: 有些指责这款手机的无线信号和天线设计。

sentences.english: I chose these because they are high-quality whole food vitamins.
sentences.chinese: 我选择这款维生素是因为它营养全面。

definition: similar (model)/merchandise similar to that used by a celebrity etc
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
to push out/to release/to launch/to publish/to recommend
